wikipedia_page.main: Puzzle Muteson is a project of singer/songwriter Terry Magson, from the Isle of Wight. Born in London, he attended music college for a short period but decided to continue his musical explorations on his own, developing his songwriting and voice, whilst teaching himself guitar.
